column3: Why only one commit is backported from #21644?
The other commits are unrelated test improvements. I am happy to ACK a pull that backports test improvements, but I probably won't backport it myself.
Not sure if https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/280 is backported correctly: diffs on 0.21 branch and on master are different.

```
qt/paymentserver.cpp: In member function ‘void PaymentServer::handleURIOrFile(const QString&)’:

qt/paymentserver.cpp:237:105: error: too many arguments to function ‘CTxDestination DecodeDestination(const string&)’

                 const CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(recipient.address.toStdString(), error_msg);

> ```
